snippet: Asked to fill in for the tenor Joseph Calleja, Michael Fabiano rushed to New York, was fitted for costumes and a few hours later, wowed the audience.
abstract: Tenor Michael Fabiano's last-minute enlistment as replacement for Joseph Calleja in Metropolitan Opera production of Donizetti's Lucia di Lammermoor is latest in line of luxury stand-ins at the Met; general manager Peter Gelb sometimes bypasses understudy for stars in order to give audiences high-flying singers; chronicle of hours preceding Michael Fabiano's entrance on stage noted.
lead_paragraph: Asked to fill in for the tenor Joseph Calleja, Michael Fabiano rushed to New York, was fitted for costumes and a few hours later, wowed the audience.

headline.main: Michael Fabiano’s 7 Hours From Call to Stage at the Metropolitan Opera
